metadata.verification_status: VERIFIED - Real data only, zero fabrication

expert_review.role: R&D Engineering Manager, Electric Coin Company

project_basic_info.description: The first cryptocurrency to develop zero-knowledge encryption for private peer-to-peer payments

launch_history.initial_price_notes: Over $5,000 at launch due to hype and low supply (over 6 BTC at the time)

precursor_project.name: Zerocoin
precursor_project.description: Originally proposed as a privacy extension to Bitcoin, pivoted to standalone protocol

zerocash_paper.title: Zerocash: Decentralized Anonymous Payments from Bitcoin
zerocash_paper.note: This paper introduced zk-SNARKs for cryptocurrency, enabling the first truly confidential transaction amounts

company_formation.name: Zerocoin Electric Coin Company (now Electric Coin Co.)
company_formation.purpose: Created to develop the Zcash protocol

historical_significance.note: Zcash was the first widely deployed cryptocurrency to ensure confidentiality of transaction amounts. Monero only deployed RingCT in 2017, over a year after Zcash's launch.
historical_significance.source: Daira-Emma Hopwood (ECC R&D Engineering Manager), December 2025

cryptonote_correction.explanation: The CryptoNote 1.0 and 2.0 papers had backdated publication dates. This backdating was related to the ByteCoin premine scandal.
cryptonote_correction.impact: Any references to CryptoNote originating in 2012 should be corrected to 2014

cypherpunk_stance.philosophy: Privacy is a fundamental human right
cypherpunk_stance.compliance_note: There is no compliance in the protocol - that's for exchanges and services, not the protocol itself
cypherpunk_stance.data_collection_note: No data collected at protocol level. Users may opt-in to specific wallet features.
cypherpunk_stance.wallet_auth_note: No wallet sign-in, only seed phrases for self-custody
cypherpunk_stance.privacy_policy_note: Decentralized blockchains don't need privacy policies - that's for services and wallets, not protocols

primary_founder.name: Zooko Wilcox-O'Hearn
primary_founder.description: Computer security specialist and original cypherpunk
primary_founder.role: Founder and former CEO of Electric Coin Company
primary_founder.current_role: Director on the board of the Bootstrap Project (parent company of ECC)
primary_founder.notable_achievement: Led development of first real-world application of zero-knowledge proofs

founding_scientists.note: Official founding-scientists page at z.cash redirects but does not provide detailed list

electric_coin_company.legal_name: Electric Coin Company (formerly Zerocoin Electric Coin Company)
electric_coin_company.core_values: Financial privacy is essential to protect human dignity, security, self-sovereignty, and consent

ceo.name: Josh Swihart
previous_roles: SVP of Growth at ECC (October 2018 - August 2023)
CEO and owner of Aspenware (acquired by Aspen Ski Company and Alterra Resorts)
SVP of Global Marketing at K2 (acquired by Francisco Partners)
Global Practice Principal at Interlink Group (acquired by EMC and TPG)
Co-founder and VP of Software Development at 3t Systems

key_products.zcash_protocol: Privacy-focused cryptocurrency protocol using zero-knowledge proofs

zashi_wallet.description: Mobile wallet for storing, sending, and receiving ZEC with secret messages
features: Tor network integration for enhanced privacy

zcash_foundation.mission: Build financial privacy infrastructure for the public good
zcash_foundation.core_belief: Privacy is a fundamental human right

governance.board_composition: Five independent directors plus Executive Director

board_of_directors.name: J.W. Verret
board_of_directors.title: Associate Professor at Antonin Scalia Law School

board_of_directors.name: Taylor Hornby
board_of_directors.background: Former security engineer at Electric Coin Company

board_of_directors.name: Andrew Miller
titles: Assistant professor at University of Illinois
Associate director of Initiative for Cryptocurrencies and Contracts

board_of_directors.name: Ted Hoffmann
board_of_directors.background: European citizen passionate about Ethereum and Zcash

board_of_directors.name: Peter Van Valkenburgh
board_of_directors.title: Director of Research at Coin Center

team_members.name: Alex Bornstein
team_members.title: Interim Executive Director & Chief Operating Officer

frost.name: FROST
frost.full_name: Flexible Round-Optimized Schnorr Threshold signature scheme

ecosystem_activities: Provides governance through Zcash Improvement Proposal (ZIP) process

notable_changes: ZIP 271: Deferred Dev Fund Lockbox Disbursement
ZIP 1016: Community and Coinholder Funding Model (partial)

top_contributors.name: Daira-Emma Hopwood
top_contributors.title: R&D Engineering Manager at Electric Coin Company

technical_details.key_technology: Zero-knowledge proving scheme for transaction privacy
features: Zero-knowledge encryption for private peer-to-peer payments

Contact Zcash Foundation or Electric Coin Company for verified list
